description:
The duel between Taikoubou and Raishinshi begins. Empress Kyouhi, Zhou`s wife, is put under arrest because she has been accused of sending an assassin to kill Zhou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Empress Ryouhi is Arrested as a Traitor
Kougou Kyouhi, Gyakuzoku to Shite Torawareru
L`Impératrice Chiang est arrêtée pour rébellion
皇后姜妃, 逆賊として囚われる
